message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and we'll see how this goes.
That's not fair at all, Alice.  Let's be reasonable - I'll take 60%, you take 40%.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60% is still too much. Let's try 80/20 this time.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. This is the definition of fair - 50/50. Take it or leave it.
